Title: Establishes a user-friendly benefits cliff calculator tool
Summary: Establishes a user-friendly benefits cliff calculator tool that allows users to understand how changes to gross income can affect eligibility for public assistance programs and long-term financial self-sufficiency and sustainability.
LawCode: Add ยง98, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to establishing a user-friendly benefits cliff calculator tool
